label: IndexerExecutionResult
description: Represents the result of an individual indexer execution.

fields.label: Status
fields.tooltip: The outcome of this indexer execution.

fields.label: Status Detail
fields.tooltip: Additional details for the outcome of this indexer execution.

fields.label: Mode
fields.tooltip: The mode the indexer is running in.

fields.label: Start Time
fields.tooltip: The start time of this indexer execution.

fields.label: End Time
fields.tooltip: The end time of this indexer execution, if the execution has already completed.

fields.label: Items Processed
fields.tooltip: The number of items that were processed during this indexer execution. This includes both successfully processed items and items where indexing was attempted but failed.

fields.label: Items Failed
fields.tooltip: The number of items that failed to be indexed during this indexer execution.

fields.label: Error Message
fields.tooltip: The error message indicating the top-level error, if any.

fields.label: Initial Tracking State
fields.tooltip: Change tracking state with which an indexer execution started.

fields.label: Final Tracking State
fields.tooltip: Change tracking state with which an indexer execution finished.
